name: VHS vs BETAMAX
description:
It's impossible to decide which is the superior video format without violence, so grab your collection and chuck them at your opponent in this quick paced, insta-death platforming combat game. Play a succession of rapid quick-fire battles where you must dodge VHS tapes, block them with your shield, or toss them at the other player.

---
UPDATED TO VERSION 1.0
> 2 - 4 player VHS throwing combat
> Works with all controller types
> Supports multiple control schemes (see below)
> Features 4 different stages
> Now with a finite number of rounds and a victory scene.
> Added a final-round mode.
> You can add AI bots, but they haven't been updated since the prototype phase. Don't expect them to be very smart.
> On the menu, press X to change the stage and B to change the number of rounds.

---
CREDITS

---
GAMEPAD CONTROLS (RECOMMENDED)
NOTE: You must plug in the controllers before launching the game.
MOVE: Left-Stick
SHIELD: Right-Stick
JUMP: A
ATTACK: X

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE CONTROLS (RECOMMENDED)
MOVE: WASD
AIM: Mouse
JUMP: Space
ATTACK: Left Mouse Button
SHIELD: Right Mouse Button

2 PLAYERS ON 1 KEYBOARD CONTROLS
P1-MOVE: WASD
P1-AIM: WASD
P1-JUMP: Quickly Tap W
P1-ATTACK: F
P1-SHIELD: G

P2-MOVE: Arrow Keys
P2-AIM: Arrow Keys
P2-JUMP: Quickly Tap Up
P2-ATTACK: Comma
P2-SHIELD: Period
